statements: DELETE FROM library_books WHERE author = 'Charles Dickens' AND publication_year < 1900;
DELETE FROM library_books WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM circulation_records WHERE book_id = 10 AND borrower_id = 5;
DELETE FROM circulation_records WHERE borrower_id = 100 AND checkout_date < '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM BookCopies WHERE library_id = 101 AND availability = false;
DELETE FROM BookCopies WHERE library_id = 3 AND availability = false;
